text: 3.16: Ta 2.8; Hi 13.18; 1 Pi 2.12Nde zazera bunin vhuuiŋra mben buni ŋgarkav, mbarara mbe suaŋri. Nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman, nde nzerara wari kɨri. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip buni mbatɨgir nde suaŋv nde sɨɨnga. Nde Krais tɨvar vhuuŋ zɨn vuim, nde nzɨɨi gumgi, mbe wari wo suaŋgi buni mbatɨgi, mbe ntan mbergirga.
